metadata.dc:author: Hernández Navarro, E
Losada Guerra, J L
metadata.dc:description: Twenty-six patients, aged 38 to 78 years, with testicular hydrocele were treated by aspiration, punction and tetracycline instillation. The cure rate was 79%. Inflammation of the scrotum was observed in all of the cases. Due to recurrence two patients underwent surgery, which revealed a hematocele.
metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento esclerosante con tetraciclina del hidrocele del testículo.
[Sclerosing therapy of testicular hydrocele with tetracycline].
